meanings.sent1: The farmer stored the unmilled grains in the barn.
meanings.sent2: The unmilled rice had a rough texture.
meanings.sent3: The unmilled flour refused to be turned into a fluffy cake.
meanings.sent4: Her unmilled ideas were waiting to be refined into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The unmilled wood felt raw and untouched by human hands.

meanings.sent1: The chef used unmilled peppercorns for a stronger flavor.
meanings.sent2: The unmilled spices added a unique taste to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The unmilled garlic cloves rolled around the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: Her unmilled dreams were waiting to be explored and realized.
meanings.sent5: The unmilled coffee beans released a rich aroma when ground.
